definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="112" y="71"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">global:ForceStrength</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MINUS</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:ForceStrength</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">global:ForceConnectionInDeath</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MINUS</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:ForceConnectionInDeath</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:ForceConnectionInDeath</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">kill</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_set_gamemode"><field name="gamemode">ADVENTURE</field><next><block type="deal_damage"><field name="damagesource">MAGIC</field><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">9999</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
